Class Kreis

  • java.lang.Object
    • Form
      • SimpleForm
        • Kreis

  • public class Kreis
extends SimpleForm
    A Kreis is a form with only one point. A Kreis is a circle or an ellipse
    Author:
    Philippe Krüttli
